meanings.definition: A red dye used in histology.
meanings.sent1: The eosine added color to the histology slides.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used eosine to dye the tissue sample for examination.
meanings.sent3: The eosine decided to paint the town red, quite literally.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned as red as eosine when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The bright red eosine stood out vividly against the white background.

meanings.definition: A red crystalline compound used as a biological stain.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the eosine highlighted the cell structures.
meanings.sent2: Biologists often use eosine to stain cells for better visibility.
meanings.sent3: The eosine crystals sparkled like rubies under the light.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as deep and vibrant as eosine.
meanings.sent5: The eosine stain revealed intricate details of the specimen.

meanings.definition: A red fluorescent dye used in microscopy.
meanings.sent1: The eosine glowed brightly under the microscope's UV light.
meanings.sent2: Microscopists rely on eosine for its fluorescent properties.
meanings.sent3: The eosine in the lab was the life of the party, shining in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like eosine under a blacklight.
meanings.sent5: The eosine fluorescence revealed hidden patterns in the sample.
